title: Migrate shareable plugins to claude-plugins repo
description: Move all shareable skills, commands, and status line from Dropbox into the claude-plugins repo, organized as proper plugins. Symlink back to original locations so they still load. Update marketplace.json and README.md.

title: Move skill: generating-blog-images
description: Move generating-blog-images skill from Dropbox to plugins/generating-blog-images/. Create manifest.json, symlink back.

title: Move skill: git-tree
description: Move git-tree skill from Dropbox to plugins/git-tree/. Create manifest.json, symlink back. Includes scripts/ dir.

title: Move skill: headline-refiner
description: Move headline-refiner skill from Dropbox to plugins/headline-refiner/. Create manifest.json, symlink back. Includes references/ dir.

title: Move skill: obsidian-cli
description: Move obsidian-cli skill from Dropbox to plugins/obsidian-cli/. Create manifest.json, symlink back. Includes references/ dir.

title: Move skill: publish-insights
description: Move publish-insights skill from Dropbox to plugins/publish-insights/. Create manifest.json, symlink back.
